feed.title: Porpoise of Computing
feed.subtitle: Blog containing more in-depth analyses of topics covered on my YouTube channel, *Porpoise of Computing*.

entry.title: Welcome to my blog
entry.content:
Hi everybody!

I am the creator of the YouTube channel Porpoise of Computing. I create educational videos about various topic around computer science and related technology.

On this blog I will be posting more in-depth analyses of the topics covered in the videos, including any hands-on research I do when preparing the videos.

At the time of publication of this post, there still isn’t much available on this blog, that channel, my Twitter or GitHub, but I’m working hard to put my content out there, so stay tuned!
